comment._content: Coincidentally, Tom Roberts (see previous two photos) worked at Stewart & Co. Bourke Street ca 1880. I wonder if he arranged the backdrop, set and sitters for this photo? Ref - adbonline.anu.edu.au/biogs/A110419b.htm

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Stewart & Co. were at 217 & 219 Bourke Street between 1881 and 1889, and I think the studio font design on this card was used towards the latter part of the period (a less elaborate font design was used earlier - Dec. 1882 see handle.slv.vic.gov.au/10381/73255). As Tom Roberts left for London in 1881 and returned in 1885, and was working again for Stewart & Co. posing sitters, it is quite possible he did pose this one. Some more on Stewart & Co. and Tom Roberts in my recent post here - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/pellethepoet/6826247918/]
